FIRMWARE_REG.name: TRIGGER_BUSY_LENGTH_H
FIRMWARE_REG.comment: Veto/Busy length for next tlu trigger; high

FIRMWARE_REG.name: TRIGGER_BUSY_LENGTH_L
FIRMWARE_REG.comment: Veto/Busy length for next tlu trigger; LSB 25ns

FIRMWARE_REG.name: TRIGGER_ACCEPT_WIN_CLOSE_H
FIRMWARE_REG.comment: Close of accept window for arriving taichu data after tlu trigger; high

FIRMWARE_REG.name: TRIGGER_ACCEPT_WIN_CLOSE_L
FIRMWARE_REG.comment: Close of accept window for arriving taichu data after tlu trigger; LSB 25ns

FIRMWARE_REG.name: TRIGGER_ACCEPT_WIN_START_H
FIRMWARE_REG.comment: Start of accept window for arriving taichu data after tlu trigger; high

FIRMWARE_REG.name: TRIGGER_ACCEPT_WIN_START_L
FIRMWARE_REG.comment: Start of accept window for arriving taichu data after tlu trigger; LSB 25ns
